title: Montastruc-la-Conseillère station
text:
Montastruc-la-Conseillère is a railway station in <a href="Montastruc-la-Conseill%C3%A8re">Montastruc-la-Conseillère</a>, <a href="Occitanie">Occitanie</a>, France. It is on the <a href="Brive-la-Gaillarde%20-%20Toulouse%20%28via%20Capdenac%29%20railway">Brive-Toulouse (via Capdenac) railway</a> line. The station is served by <a href="Transport%20express%20r%C3%A9gional">TER</a> (local) services operated by <a href="SNCF">SNCF</a>.
Train services.
